title: Is a Protester Holding an ‘All Holidays Matter’ Sign?
subtitle: An image purporting to show two men with signs — one reading "We must stop the war on Christmas" and another that says "All holidays matter" — is a hoax.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: A photograph shows a protester holding a sign that says "We must stop the war on Christmas" next to another man with a sign that reads "All holidays matter."
